data.marketing-features-title: 코워킹 스페이스 운영 소프트웨어 | andCards Suite
data.marketing-features-description: 국내 최초 코워킹스페이스/공유오피스/모임센터 소프트웨어 서비스. 회의실 예약 시스템, 멤버십 결제, 장기 결제, 멤버십 엡
data.marketing-features-section-features-text: Getting started with andCards Suite coworking software is easy and won't take long to see the basics.
data.marketing-features-section-features-dire: Manage all your coworking space customers in one place. View all individuals d then accounts in Excel-like table. Track membership plans, payments, d bookings history of each customer.
data.marketing-features-section-features-plan: Create hot desk, fixed desk, private office of pass. Set a price, quantity, edit amount, and description. Residents can purchase membership plan with credit cards. Admin can manually assign a membership plan to any user. If made public, membership plans will be available on Spaces for preview nd purchase (coming soon).
data.marketing-features-section-features-book: Simple and snappy UI similar to Google Calendar. Avoid booking conflicts: internal or external bookings are on the same timeline. Book for free using credits or credit cards. Book meeting room from anywhere using mobile apps. See all bookings n your own personal calendar (Google, Outlook, Apple calendars).
data.marketing-features-section-features-cred: Give residents credits as a reward for using ur services. Credits can be added manually by admin or automatically by a membership plan. Residents can use credits to book meeting rooms. See each resident's credit spending history to better understand how they use your space.
data.marketing-features-section-features-kios: Preview meeting room booking schedule at the door. Presence control: mandatory check in and auto-cancel conditions. See meeting room availability from a distance. Complementary apps with Room Booking System.
data.marketing-features-section-features-noti: Keep members informed by sending them messages. Send push-notifications to mobile devices and web. Target notices to teams or individuals.
data.marketing-features-section-integrations-: Integrating andCards Suite coworking software ith your existing or new systems is as easy as tuning a switch.

Enable meeting room booking and membership plan purchase using credit cards. Residents can subscribe to a membership plan for seemless auto-renewval. Accept Visa or MasterCard credit cards from any country. No lengthy approval process. Payments provided in partnership with Paymentwall.
View all bookings made on andCards in your calendar of choise.
Equip meeting room with a smart lock to automate entry.
When member books meeting room, andCards gives temporary unlock code to use the room only within a booking time.
All smart locks manufactured by igloohome are supported.

Showcase your coworking space on Google-optimized andCards Spaces. No need in extra account: add photos, descriptions, amenities from andCards Suite. Make membership plan or meeting room available to public. Get priority placing, add an eye-catching PLUS badge.
